entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
